name: QuestMaster
description:
Embark on the quest to save world... but you're not the one saving it.You work here as a quest master ,  recruiting heros and send them to do the hard work!
How to play :

- Select quest from the scrolls and form a party of Adventurer to send them to beat monsters.  The Adventurer  will always beat the monster but they might not survive!
Complete the quest to get you juicy commission reward!

- Stack your earning on the paying cloth to hire wandering Adventurer !
 Classless Adventurer are ways cheaper to hire! 

- If any monster reach the city , it will be your doom!

Credits:

Music - Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi)
